00017 template <class Product>
00018 class TSupplierCompWrap: public CSupplierCompBase
00019 {
00020 public:
00021        typedef CSupplierCompBase BaseClass;
00022        typedef Product ProductType;
00023 
00024        enum MessageId
00025        {
00026               MI_DURATION_TIME = 0x077a1b
00027        };
00028 
00029        I_BEGIN_BASE_COMPONENT(TSupplierCompWrap);
00030        I_END_COMPONENT;

00034        virtual void ClearWorkResults();

00040        const Product* GetWorkProduct() const;

00054 // public methods
00055 
00056 // reimplemented (iproc::ISupplier)
00057 
00058 template <class Product>
00059 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::EnsureWorkFinished()
00060 {
00061        if (m_workStatus == WS_INIT){
00062               m_workStatus = WS_LOCKED;
00063 
00064               if (!m_productPtr.IsValid()){
00065                      m_productPtr.SetPtr(new Product());
00066               }
00067 
00068               m_workStatus = ProduceObject(*m_productPtr);
00069               Q_ASSERT(m_workStatus >= WS_OK);   // No initial states are possible
00070 
00071               m_productChangeNotifier.Reset();
00072        }
00073 }
00074 
00075 
00076 template <class Product>
00077 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::ClearWorkResults()
00078 {
00079        if (m_workStatus == WS_LOCKED){
00080               return;
00081        }
00082 
00083        m_productPtr.Reset();
00084 
00085        BaseClass::ClearWorkResults();
00086 
00087        m_productChangeNotifier.Reset();
00088 }
00089 
00090 
00091 // protected methods
00092 
00093 template <class Product>
00094 const Product* TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::GetWorkProduct() const
00095 {
00096        const_cast< TSupplierCompWrap<Product>* >(this)->EnsureWorkFinished();
00097 
00098        if (m_workStatus <= WS_OK){
00099               return m_productPtr.GetPtr();
00100        }
00101        else{
00102               return NULL;
00103        }
00104 }
